summary: A drama set during World War II where a submarine carrying a secret weapon attempts to stop a planned third atomic bombing of Japan. Based on Harutoshi Fukui's novel Shuusen no Lorelei.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Satoshi Tsumabuki|Toshirô Yanagiba|Yû Kashii|Shin'ichi Tsutsumi|Ken Ishiguro|Colter Allison|David Austin|Nicholas Dombrovskis|Christopher Ryan Doyle|Norman England|Caroline Paris Gluck|Isao Hashizume|Masatô Ibu|Takaya Kamikawa|Ryûki Kitaoka|Kreva|Jun Kunimura|Matt Lagan|Dave Monahan|J.J. Mortimer|Takehiko Ono|Shûgo Oshinari|Tyrone Power Jr.|Ryûta Satô|Seth Shapiro|Fred Spiker|Pierre Taki|Yoshiyuki Tomino|Shingo Tsurumi
title: Lorelei
